title: AI Readability, Tone & Plagiarism Analyzer
description: An advanced AI system that evaluates English text across three powerful dimensions: Readability, Tone, and Plagiarism Detection. It combines cognitive linguistics, NLP sentiment modeling, and pattern-based AI for precise text evaluation.
details: 🧩 Readability Analysis — Calculates linguistic complexity using Flesch, Gunning Fog, SMOG, and Dale–Chall formulas. Provides intuitive readability levels like 'Easy' or 'Very Difficult' with actionable tips.
💬 Tone Analysis — Uses AI-driven TextBlob NLP to analyze emotional tone and communication style, enabling writers to align their message with intent and audience.
🔍 Plagiarism Detection — Employs difflib-based similarity matching, evolving toward semantic-level detection using transformer embeddings (BERT, Sentence Transformers).
🤖 How AI Is Used — Combines rule-based reasoning, NLP, and machine learning. Each module mimics cognitive processes of reading and emotional inference.
🧠 Technical Stack — Frontend: Next.js (React) · Backend: FastAPI (Python) · textstat · textblob · difflib
🌍 Hosting — Frontend on Vercel, Backend on Railway with automated CI/CD and secure CORS configuration.
techHighlights: Empowers non-native speakers and professionals to write clearly, emotionally, and authentically.
impact: Bridges technology, psychology, and communication — empowering people to write with clarity, empathy, and originality.
